Posts.Content: Lindacim31 wrote: recently diagnosed with her2 positive post lumpectomy with clean margins. Seeing surgeon next week for post-op visit and hopefully will get complete path report. Anybody have isolated tumor cells found in sentinel node biopsy? Dx 1/26/2017, IDC, Right, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2017 09:25PM Lindacim31 wrote: Thank you all I will be seeing the surgeon for the first time Friday and very anxious to see pathology report. It seems like it has been forever waiting for all tests, Still have a couple of weeks to see oncologist. Scared to hear the details, but I tell myself that once I have a course set it will be better for my mental state. I know you all understand and for that I am grateful.
